name: AKS Istio Sidecar Injection
observations: CRITICAL FIX APPLIED: AKS Istio add-on requires explicit version matching with control plane revision
ROOT CAUSE: Standard 'istio-injection=enabled' label DOES NOT work with AKS add-on
SOLUTION: Must use revision label 'istio.io/rev=asm-1-25' to match control plane version
CRITICAL: NEVER use both istio-injection=enabled and istio.io/rev labels together - this prevents injection
Correct pattern: Remove istio-injection=enabled, use only istio.io/rev=asm-1-25
Post-fix action required: kubectl rollout restart deployment -n <namespace> to trigger injection
Success validation: Pods show 2/2 ready state instead of 1/1 (app container + istio-proxy sidecar)
AKS control plane version: istiod-asm-1-25-* pods in aks-istio-system namespace
Fixed namespaces: istio-demo, istio-staging, istio-production - all now showing 2/2 pod state
Verification confirmed: istio-proxy containers present with mcr.microsoft.com/oss/v2/istio/proxyv2:v1.25.3-4 image
